about_the_game:
Astro is a multiplayer first person shooter in zero gravity.

  • In a new addictive take on movement shooters, you can turbo, grapple, teleport, slide, kick, and more to reach top speeds!

  • Show off this adrenaline pumping movement in the first arena-style maps designed specifically with all possible directions in mind.

  • Choose loadouts containing a variety of unique items from classic fps guns to boomerangs and boomboxes. Additionally, customize your choice of gadgets and supers to create a user experience perfectly tailored to your playstyle.

  • Use your loadout in creative game modes that take advantage of Astro's zero gravity, like Orb or Death Race. Beyond core game modes, Astro features a continuously growing portfolio of limited time events like Dodgeball or Infection.

  • Team up with your friends for a full stack, or join forces officially by banding together in your own Crew.

But no description can ever do Astro justice, you need to experience the thrills of zero gravity combat yourself. Ready to redefine your idea of what a first person shooter can be? Dive into Astro!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit / Windows 11 64-Bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit / Windows 11 64-Bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Astro is a multiplayer fps, which explores the mind-bending opportunities of movement and gun fights in zero gravity. It focuses on the fun over realism, with deep and unique mechanics, weapons, and abilities.
